name: Baltie Project
summary: Project created by SGP Baltie, an object-oriented tool based on C# language used for teaching adults and children how to create their own computer program; contains a project created by the user; includes numerous aspects of the program such as constants, methods, edited models, tiles, specified distance between two points, customized Balties (little wizards), and more; can be used to generate an .EXE file for your program.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
